column1: # ALPHANUMERIC GROUP IDENTIFIERS - Core Test Data

column2: Interest rate applies to qualifying purchases. Rate may vary based on creditworthiness and market conditions.
Promotional interest rate for balance transfers. See terms and conditions for complete details.
Cash advance interest rate. Higher rate applies to cash transactions per federal regulations.

Zero percent introductory rate for new cardholders. Rate subject to change after promotional period.
Standard purchase rate applies after introductory period expires. Minimum finance charge may apply.
Balance transfer rate for existing balances. Transfer fees may apply per transaction.
Premium card interest rate for high-limit accounts. Rate based on excellent credit qualification.
Travel rewards card rate structure. Bonus rate applies to travel and dining purchases.
Business card interest rate for commercial accounts. Different terms apply for business use.
Student card interest rate with educational benefits. Lower rate for qualifying students.
Secured card rate for credit building purposes. Security deposit required for account opening.
Joint account interest rate for shared cardholders. Both parties responsible for balance.
Corporate card rate for business expense management. Volume discounts may apply.
Retail partnership card with store-specific benefits. Higher rate for non-partner purchases.
Cashback rewards card with tiered rate structure. Rate varies by spending category.
Airline co-branded card with travel benefits. Miles earned on all purchases.

Default cash advance rate for emergency transactions. Daily limits and fees apply per transaction.
Default introductory rate for approved applications. Rate changes after promotional period ends.

Default business rate for commercial account holders. Business terms and conditions apply.
Default joint rate for shared account responsibility. Both cardholders liable for all charges.
Default student rate for educational institution partnerships. Student verification required.
Default senior rate for cardholders age 65 and older. Age verification required for qualification.
Default military rate for active duty and veteran cardholders. Military ID verification required.
Default employee rate for company partnership programs. Employment verification required.
Default VIP rate for high-net-worth individuals. Asset verification and minimum balance required.

Low precision test rate - demonstrating 0.10% annual percentage rate.
Mid precision test rate - demonstrating 1.00% annual percentage rate.
High precision test rate - demonstrating 10.00% annual percentage rate.
Standard market rate - demonstrating 25.00% annual percentage rate.
High market rate - demonstrating 50.00% annual percentage rate.
Premium market rate - demonstrating 75.00% annual percentage rate.
Maximum precision test rate - highest possible interest rate value approaching 100%.
